Reviews.Title: the product is good !
Reviews.Author: sher
Reviews.Content: It takes pictures very nice i love it . if you want a nice camera and a camera that take pictures nice thid is the one you need .

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it.
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Oliver "Libète ou lamò!"
Reviews.Content: Poor quality images, card won't work. Very disapointing.After taking some pictures, uploading them, I was quiet unhappy. Outside and inside both come out horrible.Then, it would only allow me to have one picture before saying memory full because it doesn't come with a memory card but, after a week, it stopped working all together.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ES65 10.2MP 2.5"LCD 5x Optical 4x Digital Zoom, Digital Camera - Black
